intro: Brassia macrostachya, commonly known as the large-stemmed orchid, is a tropical epiphytic orchid native to Central and South America. It features striking, showy flowers that are typically violet or purple in color, with a distinctive, elongated lip. The plant has long, arching stems that can reach several feet in length, often adorned with numerous small, clustered flowers.
